main.name: Vipul Arora
main.description: Here will be your description. Use this to describe what you do or whatever you feel best describes yourself to a potential employer
main.bio: I am an athlete at heart, with an entrepreneurial spirit, a knack for designing, and a passion for coding. Born in a small town in Hanumangarh Jn, I love to create and tend to keep a few too many projects on the go at a time. Outside of work I am an avid motorcyclist and chess player. I love to travel and lead a fairly nomadic lifestyle.
main.contactmessage: Have a project for me? Think I'd be a good fit for your team? I'd love to hear from you, give me a shout by email or by using the form below if you'd like to get in contact with me.

education.description: Computer Science Engineering , Consistent 8.7 CGPA, IEEE JUIT SB(MEMBER), Angular Course Completion, Infosys | Springboard.
Won Best Science Fair Project, 86.8% in 12th, Gold medalist in athletics, IMO Gold Medalist at School level.

work.title: Made using Unity.
work.description: The game is about a prisoner stuck on a maverick island. The game is intended to think carefully and test your gaming abilities.

work.title: Made with Python, using Django framework
work.description: A web application that will provide easy access to medical resources. Providing the users organized and genuine data.

testimonials.text: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
When life gives you lemons, make lemonade.
